turns.user_input: my landlord is not returning my security deposit

agent_response.legal_route: Send legal notice to landlord and approach rent tribunal or housing court.
agent_response.outcome: Deposit refund, rent reduction, or lease termination.
process_steps: 2. Review your lease agreement and local tenant laws
3. Send written notice to landlord (certified mail)
5. File complaint with local rent tribunal/housing court

glossary.legal notice: A formal written communication from one party to another regarding legal matters.
glossary.tribunal: A special court or judicial body that handles particular types of legal matters.
